summary: This document is a collection of official Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019. It records inmate headcounts by housing unit and lists specific inmates, including those on suicide watch. The documents are procedural records from the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate headcounts were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, documented across multiple housing units and including an out-count of specific inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are official Bureau of Prisons count records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated August 10, 2019.
The records include a list of inmates on an 'out-count' form and a separate roster of inmates on 'suicide watch' or in the hospital.
The procedural nature of the documents shows the standard inmate management and headcount procedures in place at the facility on that date.
Jeffrey Epstein is not listed by name in these specific pages, which focus on other inmates and routine counts.
The documents are part of the evidentiary record surrounding the custody and management of inmates at MCC New York.
